parameters.name: ArchiveDuration
parameters.description: The number of days for which data is automatically archived after the storage expires. Valid values: 60, 90, 180, and 365. 0 indicates that the data is not archived.

parameters.name: AuthFreeReadPolicy
parameters.description: The IP addresses or CIDR blocks for which password-free read is enabled. Separate multiple IP addresses with line breaks.

parameters.name: AuthFreeWritePolicy
parameters.description: The IP addresses or CIDR blocks for which password-free write is enabled. Separate multiple IP addresses with line breaks.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the Prometheus instance.

parameters.name: EnableAuthFreeRead
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable password-free read.

parameters.name: EnableAuthFreeWrite
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable password-free write.

parameters.name: EnableAuthToken
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable access token authentication.

parameters.name: PaymentType
parameters.description: The billing mode. Valid values: POSTPAY: charges fees based on the amount of reported metric data. POSTPAY_GB: charges fees based on the amount of written metric data.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Prometheus resource group.

parameters.name: StorageDuration
parameters.description: The data storage duration. Unit: days.
